name: SimplePlatformerGame
description: I decided to make this game because I was bored(it had no name so I called it "SimplePlatformerGame") it took me 4 hours to make the game(I'm not an artist so the art part took me 1 hour and the rest of the game like making levels and making features took me 3 hours), there are project files so if you want to see them you can(as always) this might help understand how I did some stuff if you didn't know how to do them any way I hope  you enjoy the game
